titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H. R. 4781) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1989, and against consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-997.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4781 (armed forces funding) and against its consideration.
